title: 1 Bed 1 Bath Garden - 830 Sq. Ft. - Willoughby, Ohio
posting_body: Newly available 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Garden styled suite.
This floorplan offers ample amounts of beautiful living space measuring at 850 sq ft it is our largest one-bedroom property.
The apartments features include Eat-in-kitchen with all major appliances, walk in closet and private balcony.
